string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: See all your apps. Touch the Launcher icon. @drawable/all_apps
Rules The only rule of CyanogenMod: You dont ask for ETAs.
Nightly Builds (Advanced) Available on ROM Manager. Do not submit issues on Google Code for these. @drawable/rommanager
Drag apps to your Home screen. Touch & hold an app in the Launcher until it vibrates.
Rearrange your Home screen. Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it where you want.
Ballmer Peak Optimal coding ability takes place between a BAC of .129 and .138.
Remove items. Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon. @drawable/trash
iPhone You're holding it wrong. Always.
Multiple Home screens. Swipe left or right to switch. Drag items to other screens.
Number 1 Priority Don't forget to keep your winzip up to date.
Done with this widget? Touch & hold it and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon.
Kang [kayng] - (verb) Upgraded my winzip br0. Thanks to my patient lady putting up with my devvin. @drawable/kang_truck
Definition of Open repo init -u git://android.git.kernel.org/platform/manifest.git ; repo sync ; make. @drawable/android_open
